class gstBT_GeomObj

Wrapper class for gstSpatialObjects so that they all have nice generic properties to be handled by the partition class.

From header file: gstBinTree.h

~gstBT_GeomObj
Functions

inc
maxPt Access maximum point of bounding box.
minPt Access minimum point of bounding box.
